Text: So im guessing this app, like ALL your other ones require a jailbroken ipad? I know its not a big deal, but im not jailbreaking my brand new ipad 2 just to get a few apps. It would be nice if you note that in your description from now on. Im fairly sure if you do you'll see a sharp decrease in downloading, but you probably already know that.
Do you have to happen the latest version of this app? 2.x?
